projectItems.title: Thumbmagic
projectItems.description: AI-powered thumbnail generator that creates optimized images for blogs, social media, and video platforms using machine learning algorithms.

projectItems.title: PokerAce
projectItems.description: Online Texas Hold'em poker engine with multiplayer capabilities, hand analysis, and AI opponents for practicing strategy.

projectItems.title: Finance Tracker
projectItems.description: Budget and expense dashboard with visualization tools, goal setting, and personalized insights for better financial management.

projectItems.title: Tourism Dashboard (Romania)
projectItems.description: Interactive data visualization project analyzing tourism trends in Romania, built with Google Colab and Google Cloud Platform services.
